originalText.text: I have been a patient of Dr. Salim's for over 10 years and I could not recommend him and his practice more highly.   The offices of clean and staff is courteous.  Dr. Salim is  an excellent dentist and has consistently delivered top notch service.  He is patient and knowledgeable and takes time to understand what is bothering you and thoroughly explains plans to resolve your issues.

originalText.text:
Dr. Salim is an extremely knowledgeable and experienced dentist. I have been going to him for the past 10 years and I never thought about changing dentists. He has a kind and friendly demeanor with his patients and most importantly, a light touch! He has a way of making the dental experience enjoyable which is extremely rare, as we all know.
I recommend him without reservation to anyone looking for a warm, caring, and gentle dentist.

originalText.text: The best dentist in New York City. Dr. Salim is very experienced and always makes you feel comfortable before any procedure. Sutton Place Dental is very clean and they have the most advanced dental equipments. I wouldn’t go anywhere else!

text.text: The best dentist in New York City. Dr. Salim is very experienced and always makes you feel comfortable before any procedure. Sutton Place Dental is very clean and they have the most advanced dental equipments. I wouldn’t go anywhere else!

originalText.text: Dr. Salim is a wonderful dentist, who brings both kindness and professionalism to his work.  My husband and I have been patients of his for many years and we continue to be incredibly satisfied with the quality of the care we have consistently received.  I would highly recommend him for any kind of dental treatment, including cosmetic.  He is a wonderful find in NYC!

text.text: Dr. Salim is a wonderful dentist, who brings both kindness and professionalism to his work.  My husband and I have been patients of his for many years and we continue to be incredibly satisfied with the quality of the care we have consistently received.  I would highly recommend him for any kind of dental treatment, including cosmetic.  He is a wonderful find in NYC!

originalText.text: I had the harrowing experience of having a toothache on a Friday afternoon in the summer. I called Dr. Salim's office and his staff graciously set up a time for me to be examined within the hour. Luckily, Dr. Salim was able alleviate the pain and fix the problem, which if not treated would have resulted in a very uncomfortable weekend. Not only do I appreciate his excellent dental skills and professional manner but also his kind, warm personality, which makes going to the dentist enjoyable. I had traumatic experiences with my childhood dentist and before I met Dr. Salim, I would put off going to the dentist at all costs. Now I actually look forward to my dental appointments!  I have referred him to friends and family and highly recommend him to anyone who is looking for an excellent, caring dentist.
